tokens.text: interpolates between two angles taking the shortest path

description: Computes a linear interpolation around a circle in the shortest direction from `a` degrees to `b` degrees with interpolation weighting factor `t` (see `math.lerp`).

generated_doNotEdit.title: Lerprotate(start, End, 0 To 1)
generated_doNotEdit.description: Lerp the shortest direction around a circle from start degrees to end degrees via 0_to_1
